DOC.criteria: Naturally postmenopausal , symptomatic , apparently healthy woman , need hormone therapy age 50 70 year BMI > 18 ≤30 kg/m2 without previous history breast disease recruit study . They amenorrheic least 12 month le 12 month S FSH value > 40 IU/L . They free sex hormone treatment least three month inclusion . General contraindication HT accord Swedish product label . Age > 60 year . BMI ≤18 ≥30 kg/m2 . Any previous history cancer . Any previous history breast disease abnormal mammogram . In addition : hypertension ( systolic BP > 160 mm Hg diastolic > 100 mm Hg ) , hyperlipidemia ( total cholesterol > 8.0 mmol/L triglyceride > 3.0 mmol/L ) , diabetes mellitus , history thromboembolic disease , heart failure , liver disease porphyria , undiagnosed vaginal bleeding .
